Governance.title: Corporate Governance
Governance.subtitle: Commitment to Excellence, Transparency, and Ethical Business Practices
Governance.description: At MELCO, we believe that strong corporate governance is fundamental to our long-term success and sustainability. Our governance framework ensures accountability, transparency, and ethical conduct in all business operations while protecting the interests of our stakeholders.

framework.title: Governance Framework
framework.description: Our comprehensive governance framework is built on five fundamental pillars that guide our decision-making and operations:
framework.point1: Board oversight and strategic direction with independent directors
framework.point2: Risk management and internal control systems
framework.point3: Transparency in financial reporting and disclosure
framework.point5: Continuous improvement and best practice adoption

policies.title: Policies & Procedures
policies.description: We maintain comprehensive policies that govern every aspect of our business operations:

ethics.title: Code of Ethics
ethics.description: Clear ethical guidelines for all employees covering integrity, confidentiality, and professional conduct

risk.title: Risk Management
risk.description: Systematic identification, assessment, and mitigation of operational and strategic risks

sustainability.title: Sustainability
